Here are some of the data science and statistical analysis projects I've worked on. These projects cover a range of topics, including **machine learning, experimental design, and predictive modeling**. Click on each project to explore the details and download the full reports.

## **Skills Used in These Projects**  

- **Programming & Tools:** Python, R, Tableau, Seaborn, ggplot2  
- **Machine Learning:** Logistic Regression, Random Forest, XGBoost, Ridge Regression, QDA  
- **Data Processing:** Feature Engineering, One-Hot Encoding, Data Cleaning, Cross-Validation  
- **Statistical Analysis:** ANOVA, Hypothesis Testing, Classification, Regression  
- **Experimental Design:** Randomized Block Design, Pretest-Posttest Design
